metadata.title: CVE-2011-4604 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The bat_socket_read function in net/batman-adv/icmp_socket.c in the Linux kernel before 3.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted batman-adv ICMP packet.

criterions.comment: batmand package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
